import React, { useRef } from 'react' const AddImage = props => { const imgRef = useRef(null) const img_pathUrl = (input) => { console.log(input.target.files) imgRef.current.src = (window.URL ? URL : webkitURL).createObjectURL(input.files[0]); } let content = (
img_pathUrl(input)} />
Photo/Video
) return content } export default AddImage
